title: Bug 13189: Refactoring deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description: On 20020409I, I encountered an issue on LinuxMotif and w2k. Here are the steps to reproduce the problem:
SR:
1. Setup JUnit.
2. Enable the option 'Code GeneratorRemove prefix from field names'.
3. Open TestCase.java.
4. In the outliner, right-click on 'fName'.
5. [Provide additional steps here if needed]
